    isCustomerTurning()
    compute the probablity of a customer turning away based on waiting line size the probabily start at 0, will start growing fallowing this equation: 1.097^x -2 ( x = waiting line size) The probability of customers turning away will reach 100% at a size around 100
    private void
    processArrival()
    If the server is IDLE then it will create an DEPARTURE event, otherwise it will enqueue the event in the customers queue
    private void

    Records departure time, if any customer is waiting then create new departure event and record waiting time, otherwise set the server status to IDLE

    • generateNextIA

      private double generateNextIA(double time)
      generate next interarrival time based on poisson distribution and time of day function
      Parameters:
      time - current time
      Returns:
      a new ramdomly generated value

    • processArrival

      private void processArrival()
      If the server is IDLE then it will create an DEPARTURE event, otherwise it will enqueue the event in the customers queue

    • scheduleDeparture

      private void scheduleDeparture(Server currentServer, double time, Customer customer)
      Schedule a new departure event in the event list
      Parameters:
      currentServer - the server where the customer is being served
      time - the time of the departure
      customer - the customer being served

    • isCustomerTurning

      private boolean isCustomerTurning()
      compute the probablity of a customer turning away based on waiting line size the probabily start at 0, will start growing fallowing this equation: 1.097^x -2 ( x = waiting line size) The probability of customers turning away will reach 100% at a size around 100
      Returns:
      if a customer is turning away

    • processDeparture

      private void processDeparture()
      Records departure time, if any customer is waiting then create new departure event and record waiting time, otherwise set the server status to IDLE

    • sort

      private void sort()
      Sorts the event list in order of event time
